page.title: 11Garden Centre
page.content:
Near the park is the garden centre. It used to be a swimming pool owned by the council, and was built in the 1940's. Soon it began to make a loss because the summers were too short. Then a wide crack appeared in the pool which was beyond repair and it closed 10 years ago. The pool is filled in now but the diving board is still there. It was bought and converted to a garden centre,which opened in 1981. It covers about 5 acres and you can buy plants and trees, statues, fish, swimming pools and even camping equipment. It is very busy. The owner is very rich now, and you sometimes see his Rolls Royce parked outside.
By Cumnor House School
